text.p: These are the leading stories in the Algerian press on Thursday as reported by the official Algerian news agency APS. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Islamic Society Movement (Hamas) announces it will take part in the national conference on political reform on Saturday and Sunday.
- National conference provides hope for reaching an accord which will be respected by all political parties until the next elections.
- Former ruling National Liberation Front (FLN) says ahead of national conference that chances for national reconciliation are stronger than before.
- The national dialogue is about to achieve its goals to seal a national understanding through the national conference.
